title: Biden Says Nord Stream 2 Pipeline Won’t Go Forward if Russia Invades Ukraine
sub_head: President made the comment during joint press conference with German Chancellor Olaf Scholz
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden said the Russian-built Nord Stream 2 natural-gas pipeline to Germany would be suspended if Russia invades Ukraine, with the German chancellor offering support but without explicitly saying the project would be halted.
At a joint appearance after meeting at the White House on Monday, Mr. Biden said he is confident that the pipeline would be put on hold in the event of a Russian attack.
